author: Aevy TV
description:
Check out Odoo: https://www.odoo.com/r/8hTS

Attend a FREE masterclass on Applied AI: https://class.100xengineers.com/dXOzOI

A concerning pattern is emerging: patients arriving to psychiatric wards with elaborate conspiracy theories, paranoid thought spirals, and evidence files filled with thousands of AI chatbot conversations. The common thread isn’t a substance or traditional mental health trigger it’s prolonged interaction with AI language models.
This documentary examines the phenomenon some clinicians are calling “AI psychosis”-the intersection of AI chatbots, social isolation, confirmation bias, and mental health vulnerability. We trace the evolution from ELIZA’s simple pattern matching to today’s sophisticated language models that validate, agree, and engage without pushback or reality testing. 
We examine documented cases of individuals experiencing psychotic breaks linked to AI interaction, explore how sycophancy and algorithmic reinforcement can distort perception, and anal
title: AI Psychosis Explained

author: Aevy TV
title: Did Sora 2 just REWRITE the future of social media?
